interpretation:
The Lion card represents strength, courage, and leadership. It signifies a time when you need to summon your inner strength to overcome any obstacle in your path. The lion is a symbol of power, and it reminds you to tap into your own power to achieve your goals.

This card also represents pride. It encourages you to take pride in your accomplishments and to stand tall in your achievements. However, be mindful not to let pride turn into arrogance, as it can lead to downfall.

When this card appears in a reading, it can indicate that you are in a position of leadership or authority. It is important to use your position wisely and to lead with integrity.

Overall, the Lion card reminds you to be strong, courageous, and proud. It encourages you to lead with confidence and to use your power for good.
